developernameFlagDescription: The developer name of the report to move
foldernameFlagDescription: The developer name of the folder to move the reports to
whereclauseFlagDescription: Where clause used to find reports to move
move.commandDescription: Move reports from one folder to another
errorReportNotFound: Did not find a report matching %s
errorFolderNotFound: Did not find a report folder with developername %s
errorMissingOption: The developer name or where clause must be specified
errorTooManyOption: You must specify either a developername OR a where clause to retrieve reports to move.
